verses.name: 1 Kings 20:36
verses.text: Then said he unto him, Because thou hast not obeyed the voice of the Lord, behold, as soon as thou art departed from me, a lion shall slay thee. And as soon as he was departed from him, a lion found him, and slew him.

verses.name: 1 Kings 20:37
verses.text: Then he found another man, and said, Smite me, I pray thee. And the man smote him, so that in smiting he wounded him.

verses.name: 1 Kings 20:38
verses.text: So the prophet departed, and waited for the king by the way, and disguised himself with ashes upon his face.
